price: (Rasûlüm!) De ki: Eğer doğru sözlüler iseniz, Allah katından bu ikisinden (bana ve Musa’ya inen kitaplardan) daha doğru bir kitap getirin de ben ona uyayım!
arabic: قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمَآ أَتَّبِعۡهُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul fatū bikitābin min ʿindi al-lahi huwa ahdā min'humā attabiʿ'hu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
